entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary: Hello World! I’ve meaning to create a blog for a while, I mean quite a while now! I’ve bought a personal domain from a domain registrar and not used it at least 2 times! I would buy the domain name then get on the task of creating my personal blog but the idea will slowly take the back burner due to everything else in my life. There is always something right ? To be honest, I think the main ...
